file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 72-21-00-06 - FAN - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL FAN - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the inspection of the fan assembly. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 72-21-00-200-801-A FAN ASSEMBLY - INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 72-21-00 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 72-21-00-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. FAN ASSEMBLY - INSPECTION A. General (1) To do this task, refer to the instructions given in Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 415 LH Engine 425 RH Engine D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Ladder To get access to the engine fan assembly 01 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 01 Does the task Engine fan assembly I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO THE PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the circuit breakers below and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to them. • START 1/2. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 72-21-00 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Put the ladder next to the air intake. J. Fan Assembly - Inspection SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Visually inspect the fan assembly. Refer to the last revision of Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Remove the ladder. (2) On the circuit breaker panel, close the circuit breakers below and remove the DO- NOT-CLOSE tags from them. • START 1/2. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 72-21-00 Page 3 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
